articles.title: U.S. orders families of embassy staffers to leave Ukraine amid fears of Russian invasion - CBC News
articles.description: The U.S. State Department on Sunday ordered the families of all American personnel at the U.S. Embassy in Ukraine to leave the country amid heightened fears of a Russian invasion.
articles.content:
The U.S. State Department on Sunday ordered the families of all American personnel at the U.S. Embassy in Ukraine to leave the country amid heightened fears of a Russian invasion.
